ACT
53
Reduction of legacy and orders
No one is obliged to fill in the legacy over the value of what he acquired due to the testator's death.
The necessary heir is not obliged to complete the legacy to the extent that they would reduce his necessary right of inheritance.
To the extent that a legacy is not fulfilled, the responsibility of the legatee of that legacy is reduced for the legacies and orders with which he is burdened.
